item.title: Flyposter on Giveway sign exiting Frognal Roundabout from A20, 15th August
item.description:
Why was my previous report closed without being fixed, the same Flyposter is still there?? Https://www.fixmystreet.com/report/8011633 I provided the exact location with What3Word but you still failed to remove it?! Here is the exact location again. I’m sharing a what3words address to help you find this specific location. Tap to see exactly where it is: ///popped.scam.left https://w3w.co/ popped.scam.left

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sidcup By-pass, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Indiscriminate refuse dumping, 15th August
item.description:
To Whom It May Concern, I reside at Floathaven Close, Thamesmead, London SE28 8SN. It has come to my attention that certain individuals are routinely dumping their household refuse throughout our neighborhood. This unacceptable behavior is not only causing environmental pollution but has also led to a significant increase in rodent infestations in nearby properties. Please refer to the attached picture, which includes the photo of discarded rubbish at the reported location. I urge you to take immediate action to address this ongoing issue. Kind regards,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Central Way, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
